Pathfinder - Class in uas.lntv.pacmangame.AI
This class is generated to find the shortest Path from a starting point to a certain destination.
Pathfinder(MapScreen, Enemy, Actor) - Constructor for class uas.lntv.pacmangame.AI.Pathfinder
This constructor is used to find the shortest path to an actor, which will be PacMan in this game.
Pathfinder(MapScreen, Enemy, int, int) - Constructor for class uas.lntv.pacmangame.AI.Pathfinder
Does the same as the first constructor, but uses x-/y-coordinates instead of an actor.
